name: Demo (Schwer)
description:
Demo for a platformer inspired by Hollow Knight.

Controls:

  • Move: arrow keys
  • Jump (ground, air, wall): space
  • Dash (ground, air): d
  • Attack (in input direction): w
  • Heal (hold): a
  • Interact: q

Attacking a hittable object from above will refresh your jump and dash.
Exit to the left from the initial scene for a short platforming challenge based on Hollow Knight's Path of Pain.

Known issue: releasing jump after bouncing off a hittable object will remove upwards velocity.

Asset credits:

  • Tileset: stringstar fields by Trixie
  • Font: monogram by datagoblin
  • Programmer art characters: me.
